file_name: GentechHoldingsInc_20190808_1-A_EX1A-6 MAT CTRCT_11776814_EX1A-6 MAT CTRCT_Distributor Agreement.pdf

perturbation.original_text: Company shall have Seven (7) business days after its receipt to accept (or reject for a legitimate business reason) any order submitted by Distributor. All the negotiations between Company and Distributor will be by INCOTERMS Ex-works, in origin farm, in Brazil. So will must be respected the Transite Time to destiny delivery. Should Company fail to timely accept or reject an order from Distributor in accordance with this Section, such order shall be deemed accepted and shall become binding on Company. All orders shall be fulfilled by Company within Seven (7) business days of order acceptance.
perturbation.changed_text: Company shall have Seven (7) business days after its receipt to accept (or reject for a legitimate business reason) any order submitted by Distributor. All the negotiations between Company and Distributor will be by INCOTERMS Ex-works, in origin farm, in Brazil. So will must be respected the Transite Time to destiny delivery. Should Company fail to timely accept or reject an order from Distributor in accordance with this Section, such order shall be deemed accepted and shall become binding on Company. All orders shall be fulfilled by Company within Fourteen (14) business days of order acceptance.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that Company has seven business days to fulfill orders after acceptance. The modified text changes this to fourteen business days, creating a contradiction about the order fulfillment deadline. This introduces uncertainty and could lead to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Upon Customer’s acceptance of any order, Distributor shall submit to Customer via wire transfer at least Twenty-Five Percent (25%) of the total order price. Distributor shall submit to Customer via wire transfer the remaining balance upon receipt Packing List and Bill of landing documents, from origin in Brazil Farm.
perturbation.changed_text: Upon Customer’s acceptance of any order, Distributor shall submit to Customer via wire transfer at least Fifty Percent (50%) of the total order price. Distributor shall submit to Customer via wire transfer the remaining balance upon receipt Packing List and Bill of landing documents, from origin in Brazil Farm.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that the Distributor should submit Twenty-Five Percent (25%) of the total order price upon the Customer’s acceptance of any order. The modified text changes this to Fifty Percent (50%), creating a contradiction about the initial payment amount. This introduces uncertainty and could lead to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Distributor shall have the option to renew this Agreement for an additional Three (3) year period by providing prior written notice to Company within Ninety (90) days of the end of the initial period of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor shall have the option to renew this Agreement for an additional Three (3) year period by providing prior written notice to Company within Thirty (30) days of the end of the initial period of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original contract states that the Distributor should provide notice of renewal within Ninety (90) days of the end of the initial period. The modified text changes this to Thirty (30) days, creating a contradiction about the renewal notice period. This introduces uncertainty and could lead to disputes regarding the validity of the renewal option.
